briefTitle: Drain-Less Abdominally Based Breast Reconstruction Using Lysine-Derived Urethane Adhesive
officialTitle: Drain-Less Abdominally Based Breast Reconstruction Using a Novel Lysine-Derived Urethane Adhesive (TissueGlu, Cohera Medical)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients undergoing Abdominally-Based Breast Reconstruction

  * Both unilateral or bilateral reconstruction is allowed
* Both delayed or immediate reconstruction is allowed

Exclusion Criteria:

* Diabetes
* BMI\>30
* Active smokers.
